Name: Collei
Title: "Sprout of Rebirth" Collei
Desc: "'Shouting the name of your card loudly will increase its power many-fold'... You've got to be kidding, right?"
Source: Reward for inviting Collei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

K107.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>
K107.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
